A Helper factory for instanciating HttpClient instances

Version:
1.0

Paul Cook

          Return an existing or instanciate a new HttpClient factory instance with explicitely specified connection and read timeout values

Method Detail

getInstance

public static HttpClientUtils getInstance(int connectionTimeout,
                                          int soTimeout)
Return an existing or instanciate a new HttpClient factory instance with explicitely specified connection and read timeout values

Parameters:
connectionTimeout - the timeout value in milliseconds to use when establishing a new http socket
soTimeout - the timeout value in milliseconds to wait for a http response before closing the socket
Returns:
HttpClientUtils an instance of the HttpClient factory primed with the requested timeout values

getNewHttpClient

public org.apache.http.client.HttpClient getNewHttpClient()
Instanciate a new HttpClient instance that uses the timeout values associated with this factory instance

Returns:
HttpClient a new HttpClient instance
